member.name: T:MindFusion.Diagramming.Export.ExcelExporter
member.summary: Exports MindFusion.Diagramming diagrams to Excel Open XML Format (XLSX) files.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Export.ExcelExporter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ExcelExporter class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Export.ExcelExporter.Export(MindFusion.Diagramming.Diagram,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an XLSX file representing the specified diagram.
member.param: A reference to the Diagram that will be exported.
The full path to the XLSX file.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Export.ExcelExporter.Export(MindFusion.Diagramming.DiagramDocument,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an XLSX file representing the specified DiagramDocument.
member.param: A reference to the DiagramDocument that will be exported.
The full path to the XLSX file.
